questions.text: Hey {{name}}, I'm Nelson, your accountability support partner. To kick things off, I'd like to understand where you're at on your health journey so we can determine where you intend to go. Answer a few questions and I'll design a plan specifically for you. Sound good?
Tell me, what's the most important desired outcome for you right now?

options.label: Not sure, I just need change

questions.text: Honesty is our policy. The truth isn't always pretty, but we need to determine your baseline.  So, which best describes how you usually eat?

options.label: Structured meals with protein and some veggies
No real pattern; eat whatever's convenient

questions.text: How active are you right now?

options.label: Mostly sedentary - sit most of the day, not much walking
Lightly active - some walking, chores, occasional activity
Regularly active - walk or move most days, some exercise
Very active - working on my feet, multiple workouts per week

questions.text: How jammed is your schedule most days?
Realistically, how much time will you commit to moving your body EVERY day? Start small because consistency matters more than duration.
questions.disclaimer: You can always do more, but commit to what you'll do even on your worst days.
